summary:
## The European Parliament: A Kid-Friendly Summary

The European Parliament is like a big, international parliament representing people from 27 European countries. Every five years, citizens elect members to make decisions for the European Union (EU). It works with the Council of the EU to create laws, similar to how a national parliament works.

Think of it as a super-sized democracy where over 375 million people get to have a say!  It meets mostly in Brussels, Belgium, and sometimes in Strasbourg, France. Its most important job is to make sure the EU works for everyone in Europe.
title: European Parliament
